attributes.action: A legal challenge by Judicial Review (or other) of the UK EU Referendum result.
attributes.background: The validity of the result is in question as the public have now become aware that they were misled on key issues, in particular the Leave Campaign NHS poster and post referendum comments that there could be similar levels of immigration after Brexit. Voters have not properly exercised their choice.

rejection.details:
Judicial review is a court process. It is not something for which the Government or Parliament is responsible. You can read more about judicial review here:

https://www.judiciary.gov.uk/you-and-the-judiciary/judicial-review/
